full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 763 Filed 08/10/22 Page 61 of 197 2602 LCHVMAX2 Richards - direct by Carolyn during that interview; correct? A. Correct. Q. Do you recall at that time Carolyn told you that Carolyn obtained Epstein's phone number from a telephone book? A. That's what's in the 302, yes. Q. Okay.
